name: Siegfried
title: The Brave Knight
subtitle: A valiant warrior who wields a blessed greatsword
lore: A noble knight who has dedicated his life to protecting the innocent, Siegfried wields a massive greatsword with unmatched skill. His unwavering resolve and divine blessing grant him extraordinary healing abilities, making him a formidable presence on the battlefield. Through his strength and determination, he stands as a beacon of hope against the forces of darkness.

passive.name: Enhanced Healing
passive.description: All healing effects on Siegfried are [14%] more effective.

Q.name: Earthshatter Strike
Q.description: Siegfried slams the ground in the targeted nearby direction, dealing [95/170/305/525/810] damage to all enemies hit after a [0.4] second delay in a circle. If the enemy is hit in the inner circle, the ability deals an additional [65%] bonus damage.

W.name: Knight's Resolve
W.description: Siegfried channels for [1s], gaining [40%] Damage Reduction and [30%] bonus Movement Speed that decays over the duration. During the channel, he heals for [17%] missing HP + [7/11/15/19/23%] max HP.

E.name: Whirling Blade
E.description: Siegfried spins around with his greatsword extended, dealing [100/200/335/500/700] damage to all nearby enemies. The cooldown is reduced by [1s] for each enemy hit.

R.name: Blessed Blade
R.description: Siegfried blesses his sword for [10s]. During this time, his basic attacks deal [200% AD] damage and grant him [10%] Lifesteal.

1.name: Protective Healing
1.description: If Siegfried is healed or he heals himself he takes [3%] less damage for [3s].

1.name: Quickened Earthshatter
1.description: The cooldown of the Q ability is reduced from [16s/13s/11s/10s/9s] to [15s/12s/10s/9s/8s].

1.name: Crushing Blows
1.description: Quest: Deal 7500 damage with basic attacks -> Siegfried's AD scaling changes from [7.85] to [9].

5.name: Enhanced Strength
5.description: Siegfried's AD scaling changes from [7.85] to [10].

5.name: Stalwart Defense
5.description: Siegfried now blocks [8%] of all incoming damage.

10.name: Unyielding Warrior
10.description: Siegfried gains [7%] additional magic shield for the duration.

10.name: Blessed Aegis
10.description: Siegfried gains a second stack for his W for the R duration. His W can be cast instantly.

15.name: Rapid Spin
15.description: The cooldown of the E ability is decreased by [3s].

15.name: Fortified Resolve
15.description: The cooldown of the W ability is reduced by [7s], but it only restores [11%] of his max HP.

15.name: Iron Will
15.description: Siegfried gains [5%] more enhanced healing below [10%] HP.

20.name: Last Stand
20.description: Upon dying, Siegfried passes his healing enchant to the two lowest HP closest allies for [4s].

20.name: Growing Resilience
20.description: Siegfried gains [2%] bonus healing enchant whenever he is healed (max [8%]).

20.name: Twin Strikes
20.description: Siegfried's Q gains a second charge.

20.name: Blessed Blade Mastery
20.description: Siegfried gains [0.65] attack speed for the R duration.

weaknesses: Can be kited by ranged champions
